description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POSIMYTH The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite: from n/a through 5.6.2.

product.name: The Plus Addons for Elementor Page Builder Lite
